C

cbClient - Variable in class presentation.ordersController
 
cbProduct - Variable in class presentation.ordersController
 
Client - Class in model
Client class - Resembles the client table in the database and has the fields exactly the same type as the columns from the corresponding table.
Client(int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Client
 
Client(String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Client
 
ClientBLL - Class in bll
Client BLL class - contains the methods which encapsulate the application logic for the operations on the clients table (finding a client by id, inserting a client in the table, deleting a client, updating and displaying all entries in the table).
ClientBLL() - Constructor for class bll.ClientBLL
constructor for the bussiness layer of the client logic
ClientDAO - Class in dao
ClientDAO - contains the queries and the methods that define the common operations for accessing the clients table: findById(int clientId); insert(Client client); delete(int clientId); update (Client client, int clientID); selectAll();
ClientDAO() - Constructor for class dao.ClientDAO
 
clientsController - Class in presentation
Clients controller - creates the flow between the clients' scene and the application.
clientsController() - Constructor for class presentation.clientsController
 
close(Connection) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
method for closing the connection
close(ResultSet) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
method for closing the result set
close(Statement) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
method for closing the statement
connection - package connection
 
ConnectionFactory - Class in connection
ConnectionFactory - Contains the name of the driver, the database, location (DBURL), and the user and the password for accessing the MySQL Server.
Controller - Class in presentation
Controller class: - creates the connection between the GUI and the model, initialises the main scene and contains the methods which create and load the next three scenes in the application (clients scene, products scene and orders scene)
Controller() - Constructor for class presentation.Controller
 
createTable(ArrayList<?>, TableView) - Static method in class presentation.View
generates the header of the table by extracting through reflection the object properties and then populates the table with the values of the elements from the list.
